experiences.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
experiences.company: ANSR Source India Private Limited, Bengaluru
experiences.description: As a Junior Full Stack Developer, I led various projects aimed at improving our platform's tools and user interfaces.
works: Developed a proprietary Plagiarism Tool using Next JS and Express, improving content originality and accountability within our platform.
Spearheaded the improvement of Front End styles for the GranuLearn app, leading to a more engaging and user-friendly interface.
Designed and implemented an innovative authoring tool and player with Next JS, empowering content creators and enhancing the learning experience for users.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
experiences.company: ANSR Source India Private Limited, Bengaluru
experiences.description: As a Full Stack Developer Intern, I was instrumental in modernizing key components of the platform from traditional web technologies to Next JS.
works: Executed a successful migration of the admin portal to Next JS, enhancing its manageability and performance.
Upgraded the player to Next JS, resulting in notable performance improvements and a better user experience.
Revamped the GranuLearn frontend using Next JS, enhancing the user interface and experience.
